item.title: Fl3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb341550 Gene Symbol: Fl3 Gene Name: floury3 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: GhCPK84
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D10G2029 Gene Symbol: GhCPK84 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/GhCPK93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhCPK93
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G2743 Gene Symbol: GhCPK93 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/GhCPK93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhHDA14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhHDA14 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The regulation circuit composed of GhHSP24.

item.title: GhHSP24.7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhHSP24.7 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The regulation circuit composed of GhHSP24.

item.title: GhNAC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D01G0636 Gene Symbol: GhNAC4 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 4 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhNAC4 promotes drought tolerance by regulating secondary cell wall biosynthesis and ribosomal protein homeostasis.

item.title: LeACS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g095080.3.1 Gene Symbol: LeACS2 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Turnover of LeACS2, a wound-inducible 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid synthase in tomato, is regulated by phosphorylation/dephosphorylation.

item.title: MxHA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD08G1130200 Gene Symbol: MxHA2 Gene Name: plasma membrane (PM) H+-ATPase Genome: Species: Malus xiaojinensis Functional Descriptions: MxMPK6-2-mediated phosphorylation enhances the response of apple rootstocks to Fe deficiency by activating PM H+-ATPase MxHA2.
